Package org.gatein.api

The Portal Public API classes

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Portal The main interface of the portal public API.
 

Class Summary
PortalRequest The PortalRequest object represents the current request of the portal.
 

Exception Summary
ApiException Base api exception
EntityAlreadyExistsException Exception thrown when entity already exists and cannot be created.
EntityNotFoundException Exception thrown when entity cannot be found.
